actions.name: CreateIdentitySource
actions.description: Grants permission to create a reference to an external identity provider (IdP) that is compatible with OpenID Connect (OIDC) authentication protocol, such as Amazon Cognito

actions.name: CreatePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Cedar policy and save it in the specified policy store

actions.name: CreatePolicyStore
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Cedar policy and save it in the specified policy store

actions.name: CreatePolicyTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create a policy template

actions.name: DeleteIdentitySource
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an identity source that references an identity provider (IdP) such as Amazon Cognito

actions.name: DeletePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified policy from the policy store

actions.name: DeletePolicyStore
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified policy store

actions.name: DeletePolicyTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified policy template from the policy store

actions.name: GetIdentitySource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details about the specified identity source

actions.name: GetPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified policy

actions.name: GetPolicyStore
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about a policy store

actions.name: GetPolicyTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details for the specified policy template in the specified policy store

actions.name: GetSchema
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details for the specified schema in the specified policy store

actions.name: IsAuthorized
actions.description: Grants permission to make an authorization decision about a service request described in the parameters

actions.name: IsAuthorizedWithToken
actions.description: Grants permission to make an authorization decision about a service request described in the parameters. The principal in this request comes from an external identity source

actions.name: ListIdentitySources
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all of the identity sources defined in the specified policy store

actions.name: ListPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all policies stored in the specified policy store

actions.name: ListPolicyStores
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all policy stores in the calling Amazon Web Services account

actions.name: ListPolicyTemplates
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all policy templates in the specified policy store

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to view a list of resource tags for the specified policy store

actions.name: PutSchema
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update the policy schema in the specified policy store

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to the specified policy store

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified policy store

actions.name: UpdateIdentitySource
actions.description: Grants permission to update the specified identity source to use a new identity provider (IdP) source, or to change the mapping of identities from the IdP to a different principal entity type

actions.name: UpdatePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the specified Cedar static policy in the specified policy store

actions.name: UpdatePolicyStore
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the validation setting for a policy store

actions.name: UpdatePolicyTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update the specified policy template
